name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Fullstack Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **Go**, **React**, and **TypeScript**, with a solid background in building APIs and working within Payments and Blockchain ecosystems. Demonstrated expertise in Web3 technologies, **Git** version control, and Agile methodologies tailored for startup environments.

Skilled in modern frameworks and libraries such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with hands-on experience in delivering comprehensive applications. Adept at cloud-native deployments on **Azure** and **AWS**, leveraging microservices architecture and CI/CD automation for efficient software delivery. Experienced in embedding AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics, and ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Brings practical knowledge in MLOps, including developing ML pipelines and production workflow management with tools like MLflow and Kubeflow. Passionate about crafting secure, maintainable solutions that create tangible impact.
